mainBoard.name: Goblin Goon
mainBoard.originalText:
Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
mainBoard.text:
This creature can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
This creature can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

mainBoard.flavorText: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.
mainBoard.name: Beetleback Chief
mainBoard.originalText: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

mainBoard.flavorText: With a commando around, somebody's gonna get hurt.
mainBoard.name: Goblin Commando
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Commando enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

mainBoard.name: Volley Veteran
mainBoard.originalText: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.

rulings.text: The number of Goblins you control is counted only as Volley Veteran's ability resolves. If Volley Veteran is still on the battlefield, it will count itself.

mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.
mainBoard.name: Boggart Brute
mainBoard.originalText: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Once an attacking creature with menace is legally blocked by two or more creatures, removing one or more of those blockers from combat won't change or undo that block.

mainBoard.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

mainBoard.name: Goblin Instigator
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

mainBoard.flavorText: "I'm not running away! I'm figuring out the best routes."
mainBoard.name: Goblin Shortcutter
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, target creature can't block this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."
mainBoard.name: Ornery Goblin
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.

rulings.text: The triggered ability triggers once for each creature blocking or blocked by Ornery Goblin. The ability resolves and deals damage to that creature before combat damage is dealt. If that damage destroys all creatures blocking Ornery Goblin, Ornery Goblin doesn’t become unblocked.

mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, this creature deals 1 damage to that creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

foreignData.flavorText: 能力越强，丧命的危险越大。
foreignData.name: 纵火鬼怪
foreignData.text: 当纵火鬼怪死去时，你可以让它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 能力越強，喪命的危險越大。
foreignData.name: 縱火鬼怪
foreignData.text: 當縱火鬼怪死去時，你可以讓它對任意一個目標造成1點傷害。

foreignData.flavorText: Quiconque a un grand pouvoir court le risque de se faire tuer.
foreignData.name: Incendiaire gobelin
foreignData.text: Quand l'Incendiaire gobelin meurt, vous pouvez faire qu'il inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText: Mit großer Macht kommt auch das große Risiko, getötet zu werden.
foreignData.name: Goblin-Brandstifter
foreignData.text: Wenn der Goblin-Brandstifter stirbt, kannst du ihn einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zufügen lassen.

foreignData.flavorText: Con molto potere ci sono molti rischi di rimanere uccisi.
foreignData.name: Goblin Inceneritore
foreignData.text: Quando il Goblin Inceneritore muore, puoi fargli infliggere 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 大きな力は、自分をも殺してしまうほどの大きな危険を伴う。
foreignData.name: ゴブリンの付け火屋
foreignData.text: ゴブリンの付け火屋が死亡したとき、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。あなたは「ゴブリンの付け火屋はそれに１点のダメージを与える。」を選んでもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: 강력한 힘에는 높은 사망 확률이 따르는 법이다.
foreignData.name: 고블린 방화범
foreignData.text: 고블린 방화범이 죽을 때, 원하는 목표를 정한다. 당신은 고블린 방화범이 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입히게 할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: Um poder grandioso também traz consigo um grande risco de morte.
foreignData.name: Pirômano Goblin
foreignData.text: Quando Pirômano Goblin morre, você pode fazer com que ele cause 1 ponto de dano a qualquer alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Чем больше могущество, тем больше риск быть убитым.
foreignData.name: Гоблин-Воспламенитель
foreignData.text: Когда Гоблин-Воспламенитель умирает, вы можете заставить его нанести 1 повреждение любой цели.

foreignData.flavorText: Un gran poder conlleva un gran riesgo de hacer que te maten.
foreignData.name: Calcinador trasgo
foreignData.text: Cuando el Calcinador trasgo muera, puedes hacer que haga 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Arsonist
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: When this creature dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."
mainBoard.name: Makeshift Munitions
mainBoard.originalText: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.

rulings.text: If an artifact or creature has an ability allowing you to sacrifice it for mana, you can't sacrifice that permanent to generate mana and also to pay the sacrifice cost for the activated ability of Makeshift Munitions.

mainBoard.text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: This enchantment deals 1 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
